thread.title: Facebook data leak hits 87 mln users

title: Facebook data leak hits 87 mln users
text:
Facebook data leak hits 87 mln users 9:51pm BST - 01:35 
Facebook said the personal information of up to 87 million users may have been improperly shared with Cambridge Analytica, up from a previous estimate of more than 50 million. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook said the personal information of up to 87 million users may have been improperly shared with Cambridge Analytica, up from a previous estimate of more than 50 million. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qciqk2
